controls.title: Understanding the Organization and its Context
controls.description: Determine external and internal issues relevant to the purpose and strategic direction of the service management system

controls.title: Leadership and Commitment
controls.description: Top management shall demonstrate leadership and commitment with respect to the SMS

controls.title: Policy
controls.description: Top management shall establish a service management policy appropriate to the purpose of the organization

controls.title: Actions to Address Risks and Opportunities
controls.description: Plan actions to address risks and opportunities related to the SMS

controls.title: Resources
controls.description: Determine and provide the resources needed for the SMS

controls.title: Competence
controls.description: Determine necessary competence of persons doing work affecting service management performance

controls.title: Documented Information
controls.description: The SMS shall include documented information required by this document and determined as necessary

controls.title: Service Portfolio
controls.description: Manage the service portfolio including service pipeline, service catalogue, and retired services

controls.title: Service Level Management
controls.description: Agree service levels with customers and ensure services are delivered according to SLAs

controls.title: Capacity Management
controls.description: Determine and manage the capacity and performance of services

controls.title: Service Availability Management
controls.description: Determine service availability requirements and monitor and report on service availability

controls.title: Service Continuity Management
controls.description: Plan for service continuity including availability and recovery requirements

controls.title: Incident Management
controls.description: Record, classify, prioritize, escalate, resolve, and close incidents

controls.title: Service Request Management
controls.description: Record, classify, fulfill, and close service requests

controls.title: Problem Management
controls.description: Identify and manage problems to minimize impact and prevent recurrence

controls.title: Change Management
controls.description: Ensure all changes are assessed, approved, implemented, and reviewed in a controlled manner

controls.title: Release and Deployment Management
controls.description: Plan, schedule, and control the build, test, and deployment of releases

controls.title: Configuration Management
controls.description: Define and control service and infrastructure components

controls.title: Monitoring, Measurement, Analysis and Evaluation
controls.description: Determine what needs to be monitored and measured, and the methods for analysis and evaluation

controls.title: Internal Audit
controls.description: Conduct internal audits at planned intervals to provide information about the SMS

controls.title: Nonconformity and Corrective Action
controls.description: React to nonconformities and take action to control and correct them

controls.title: Continual Improvement
controls.description: Continually improve the suitability, adequacy, and effectiveness of the SMS
